front.title: Circuit Style Segment Routing Policies with Optimized SID List Depth

abstract.t: Service providers require delivery of circuit-style transport services in a segment routing based IP network. This document introduces a solution that supports circuit style segment routing policies that allows usage of optimized SID lists (i.e. SID List that may contain non-contiguous node SIDs as instructions) and describes mechanisms that would allow such encoding to still honor all the requirements of the circuit style policies notably traffic engineering and bandwidth requirements.
